name: Forest Fairways
description:
Forest Fairways is a small, in-browser mini-golf game set in a forest environment. There are a full 18 courses, which progressively become more difficult. Play to the end to find what secrets the forest holds!

NOTE: The current version of the game is feature-complete in terms of gameplay, but the map is still being developed and the settings menu is not fully functional yet. The next update will include graphics profiles.
